00061         public static Bitmap TakeScreenShot()
00062         {
00063             try
00064             {
00065                 Rectangle TotalScreenRect = Rectangle.Empty;
00066                 foreach (Screen CurrentScreen in Screen.AllScreens)
00067                 {
00068                     TotalScreenRect = Rectangle.Union(TotalScreenRect, CurrentScreen.Bounds);
00069                 }
00070                 Bitmap TempBitmap = new Bitmap(TotalScreenRect.Width, TotalScreenRect.Height, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
00071                 Graphics TempGraphics = Graphics.FromImage(TempBitmap);
00072                 TempGraphics.CopyFromScreen(TotalScreenRect.X, TotalScreenRect.Y, 0, 0, TotalScreenRect.Size, CopyPixelOperation.SourceCopy);
00073                 TempGraphics.Dispose();
00074                 return TempBitmap;
00075             }
00076             catch (Exception a)
00077             {
00078                 throw a;
00079             }
00080         }
00081         #endregion
00082     }
